pullrequest.title: Config and cmake fixes for Windows build

content.raw: After `rm -rf build` on ign-transport I can reproduce your issues with protobuf. @nkoenig I believe we should update the protobuf zip file we distribute to place libraries in a `x64` subdirectory. That was FindProtobuf.cmake will work as expected on windows
content.html: After rm -rf build on ign-transport I can reproduce your issues with protobuf. @nkoenig I believe we should update the protobuf zip file we distribute to place libraries in a x64 subdirectory. That was FindProtobuf.cmake will work as expected on windows
